about_the_game:
Game Introduction

"Destiny Isle: Demo" is a demo version of a narrative adventure game/visual novel that blends survival horror, multiplayer combat, and puzzle-solving elements. Set in a mysterious, isolated academy, players assume the role of freshman Xu Fan and experience the suspenseful events of the first chapter in an atmosphere interwoven with darkness and hope, gradually uncovering the terrifying truth hidden deep within the campus. Please note, this demo only includes the full experience of the first chapter; the complete story and subsequent chapters will be available in the full version.

Core Gameplay Features

Innovative Narrative Mechanism
Experience a unique storytelling style as the demo introduces an initial demonstration of time-travel mechanics and character bonding interactions.

Mysterious Exploration Elements
Explore the misty forest altar, select areas of an underground laboratory, and secret files hidden within the academy, enjoying the thrill of puzzle-solving and discovery.

Story Highlights

At this mysterious academy, isolated from the mainland, freshman Xu Fan immediately senses an undercurrent of unease lurking behind the campus facade. As his exploration deepens, he gradually uncovers the dark forces and complex relationships concealed beneath the calm exterior, embarking on a suspense-filled and unpredictable adventure. (Note: The storyline presented here is solely the content of the demo's first chapter; the full version will unveil a grander narrative with multiple endings.)

Unique Design Philosophy

  • Blending Eastern mysticism with Western academy aesthetics to create uniquely atmospheric scenes.

  • Cleverly integrating survival horror, multiplayer combat, and puzzle-solving adventure to offer a diverse range of interactive experiences.

  • Focusing the demo on delivering the core experience of the first chapter, providing players with an exciting and intense introductory adventure.

Game Features

  • Meticulously crafted European-style academy scenes and atmospheric designs deliver an immersive visual experience.

  • A diverse array of gameplay elements and adrenaline-pumping survival trials present players with a striking adventure in the first chapter.

  • Unique character interactions and innovative narrative mechanisms ensure that every choice is imbued with suspense and possibility.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2125 or AMD A8-5600K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Pro 580 or GeForce GTX 650 or AMD Radeon R7
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti or Radeon R9 270
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: DestinyIsle Demo is a demo narrative adventure/visual novel mixed with survival horror. At a forgotten island academy, students face their fate while uncovering time warps and revengeful plots. Players need to choose between betrayal and trust and find the truth of the story. (Demo: Chapter 1 only.)
